name: Unarmed strike (Damage)
description: Instead of damage, can Shove or Grapple (with DC)

name: Net
description: Up to Large target; DC 10 Athletics to escape as an Action
tooltip:
When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with throwing a Net. Target a creature you can see within 15 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 plus your Dexterity modifier and Proficiency Bonus) or have the Restrained condition until it escapes. The target succeeds automatically if it is Huge or larger.
To escape, the target or a creature within 5 feet of it must take an action to make a DC 10 Strength (Athletics) check, freeing the Restrained creature on a success. Destroying the Net (AC 10; 5 HP; Immunity to Bludgeoning, Poison, and Psychic damage) also frees the target, ending the effect.

name: Improvised Weapon
description: Damage die, type, range, etc. are at the DM's discretion

name: Alchemist's Fire
description: Target +1d4 at the start of each of its turns; Can end if target falls prone and uses their action to extinguish.

name: Holy Water
description: Only does damage against fiends and undead; Comes in flasks

name: Acid Splash
description: 5ft rad. sphere Dex save, success - no damage;

name: Chill Touch
description: Target can't regain HP; Undead dis. on attacks vs. me until my next turn

name: Eldritch Blast
description: Each d10 is a separate beam requiring separate rolls

name: Produce Flame
description: 10-ft radius bright light and 10-ft radius dim light until thrown

name: Ray of Frost
description: Target -10 ft speed until start of my next turn

name: Sacred Flame
description: Dex save, no bonus from cover, success - no damage; 1 creature

name: Shillelagh
description: Imbued club or quarterstaff; Counts as a magical weapon

name: Shocking Grasp
description: Target cannot make opportunity attacks until its next turn

name: Vicious Mockery
description: Wis save, success - no damage, fail - also disadv. on next attack roll in next turn; 1 creature

name: Thorn Whip
description: Melee spell attack, pull target up to 10 ft closer

name: Automatic rifle
description: Ammunition, reload (30 shots), two-handed, burst fire; Slow

name: Bomb, renaissance
description: Dex save for all within 5-ft radius
tooltip:
As an action, a character can light this bomb and throw it at a point up to 60 ft away. Each creature within 5 ft of that point must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or take 3d6 fire damage.
   A bomb costs 150 gp and weights 1 lb.

name: Dynamite stick
description: Dex save for all within 5-ft radius
tooltip: As an action, a character can light this stick of dynamite and throw it at a point up to 60 ft away. Each creature within a 5-ft-radius Sphere must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or take 3d6 force damage.

name: Fragmentation Grenade
description: Dex save for all within 20-ft radius
tooltip: As an action, a character can either throw a grenade at a point up to 60 ft away or use a Grenade Launcher to propel the grenade to a point up to 1,000 ft away. Each creature within a 20-ft-radius Sphere must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 5d6 piercing damage.

name: Create Bonfire
description: 5-ft cube; Dex save at casting or when moved into, success - no damage; Conc, 1 min

name: Frostbite
description: Con save, success - no damage, fail - also disadv. on next weapon attack roll in next turn; 1 creature

name: Magic Stone
description: Produces 3 stones that each can be thrown (60 ft) or hurled with a sling (120 ft) as a spell attack

name: Thunderclap
description: Con save, success - no damage; all creatures in area; audible in 100 ft

name: Booming Blade
description: First damage added to the attack; second to the target if it moves next round

name: Green-Flame Blade
description: First damage added to the attack; second to a target within 5 ft

name: Lightning Lure
description: Str save; success - nothing; fail - pulled 10 ft closer to me, only take damage if end within 5 ft of me

name: Sword Burst
description: Dex save, success - no damage; all creatures in range

name: Shadow Blade
description: Finesse, light, thrown; +1d8 at SL3/5/7; Adv. if target in dim light/darkness

name: Infestation
description: Con save, success - no damage, fail - target also moved 5 ft in random direction

name: Toll the Dead
description: Wis save, success - no damage; If target is at full HP, d8 instead of d12 damage

name: Word of Radiance
description: Con save, success - no damage; Only chosen creatures I can see are affected

name: Oversized Longbow
description: Ammunition, heavy, two-handed; Damage uses Str; Requires Medium size and Str 18

name: Double-bladed scimitar
description: Two-handed; With Attack action, one attack as bonus action for 1d4

name: Sapping Sting
description: Con save, success - no damage, fail - also fall prone

name: Mind Sliver
description: 1 creature Int save, success - no damage, fail - also -1d4 on first save before my next turn ends

name: Hoopak, melee
description: Finesse, two-handed; Can be used ranged (40/160 ft) with ammo, for 1d4 bludgeoning damage

name: Hoopak, ranged
description: Ammunition, finesse, two-handed; Can be used in melee without ammo, for 1d6 piercing damage

name: Concussion Grenade
description: All within 20-ft radius, Dex save halves
tooltip:
As an action, a character can throw a grenade at a point up to 60 feet away. With a grenade launcher, the character can propel the grenade up to 120 feet away.
   A concussion grenade explodes in a concussive blast that fills a 20-foot-radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 6d6 force damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.

name: Energy Beam
description: Dex save, success - no damage; Acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage [my choice]

name: Mind Slam
description: Con save, success - no damage, fail - Large or smaller target also knocked prone

name: Psychic Hammer
description: Str save, success - no damage, fail - also move 10 ft in chosen direction

name: Hand of Radiance
description: Con save, success - no damage; Only chosen creatures I can see are affected

name: Infestation
description: Con save, success - no damage, fail - target also moved 5 ft in random direction

name: Primal Savagery
description: Does either Piercing or Slashing damage (my choice)

name: Unarmed strike (DC)
description: Up to 1 size larger; Push 5 ft or prone or grappled condition; Can damage instead (with attack roll)

name: Oil
description: If covered target takes fire damage in next minute, the oil burns for 5 fire damage

name: Sorcerous Burst
description: (Acid/Cold/Fire/Lightn/Pois/Psy/Thund) dmg; if I roll an 8 add 1d8 dmg(I can add a number of d8's equal to spell mod)

name: Starry Wisp
description: target emits dim light in a 10ft rad., can't benefit from Invis.

name: True Strike
description: As Part of this Spell make one Weapon Atk using your Spell mod instead of Str/Dex, Dmg can become Radiant

name: Bomb
description: Dex save for all within 5-ft radius
tooltip:
As an action, a character can light this bomb and throw it at a point up to 60 ft away. Each creature within a 5-ft-radius Sphere must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or take 3d6 fire damage.
   A bomb costs 100 gp and weights 1 lb.
